title: HospitalSys - Healthcare Management System
description: MILP algorithm optimizes appointment scheduling and reduces wait times.
Built with Angular for UI, Django REST for APIs, and MySQL for data storage.
Google Cloud Storage secures patient files for easy and safe access.
Responsive design with Bootstrap for seamless access on all devices.

title: Mr. Penguin - E-commerce Website
description: Uses Laravel Fortify for secure authentication, protecting user data.
The cart system allows users to easily add, remove, and view items.
Includes an admin panel for managing products, orders, and users.
Docker is used for easy deployment and environment consistency.
